item.title: Testimonial Video UGC Creator for Forex Trading Community - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there!

I'm searching for a UGC creator who wants to record a testimonial video with me for my Forex trading group. I'm looking for someone who is very well-spoken in English and would like to hop on a Zoom call for around 15 minutes to record the video.

I will provide you with a script and guide you on what to say. The project is straightforward and can be completed on the same day.

Let me know if you're interested!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 09:10 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:English, Video Production
Skills: English, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Shorts/Tiktok Repurposer from Youtube Longforms in the Style of HealthygamerGG - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a shorts editor and clipper to make shorts and tiktok clips from my longform videos. My channel is BingeDietitian on Youtube and I specialise in the niche of binge eating recovery.

I make longform videos in the style of HealthygamerGG and want someone to help me make shorts by clipping key points in my videos

ANYONE can clip shorts out of longforms but I am looking for someone who has a keen eye for understanding my content and clipping out which will spark conversations and intrigue which will get views and comments to the short.

To do this, I REQUIRE that you have great grammar (as you will be correcting auto-captions), ability to add video stock, and can work autonomously

This role will be $5 per hour for 4 hours max per week. I will expect 4-8 shorts per week to explode the growth of my channel. You will be posting in Shorts and Tiktok.

I AM LOOKING TO HIRE AND START TODAY
I will send you a tutorial video on successful application


Budget: $5
Posted On: June 30, 2024 08:52 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Real Estate Video Walkthrough in Brisbane - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer to capture a real estate video walkthrough in Brisbane, Australia. This project is actually for a renovation series, showcasing the "after" transformation rather than a typical house for sale. The ideal candidate will have experience in real estate videography and a creative eye for capturing the essence of the property. The videographer will be responsible for filming and editing high-quality footage that showcases the key features of the home.

We anticipate filming to take no more than half a day, with the deliverable being a ~3-5 minute video.

Budget: $802
Posted On: June 30, 2024 08:49 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Australia
click to apply
